alert.note: Alert for Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 6:40PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pinellas County through 715 PM EDT... At 640 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clearwater, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clearwater, Largo, Palm Harbor, East Lake, Safety Harbor, Belleair, Crystal Beach, Honeymoon Island and Caladesi Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
